name: New Inn to Bell Gate, Stowe

ai.summary: This is a short, easy 1.1 km hike from New Inn to Bell Gate near Stowe in the UK. The route is suitable for families and casual walkers, with gentle terrain and minimal elevation change.
ai.terrain_summary: Mostly on well-maintained footpaths and quiet lanes. Expect level ground with a few gentle slopes and optional grassy verges. Surfaces are primarily tarmac or compacted gravel; mud is possible after rain.
ai.safety_notes: For a short urban–rural route, wear sturdy footwear and weather-appropriate clothing. Be aware of traffic on road sections, especially near crossings. Keep dogs under control and supervise children at all times. Carry water, a light snack, and a map or phone with offline navigation. Check daylight hours and weather before setting out.
recommended_gear: Weather-appropriate clothing and a light waterproof layer
Map or offline navigation on a phone
Sun protection (hat and sunscreen) in sunny conditions
ai.best_seasons: All year, with particularly pleasant conditions in spring and autumn.

seo.title: New Inn to Bell Gate, Stowe – Easy 1.1 km Hike in the UK
seo.meta_description: Discover an easy 1.1 km route from New Inn to Bell Gate in Stowe, UK. This family-friendly hike features gentle terrain and simple navigation tips.
